TextView.android:text:
• Assisting farmers in maintaining their field as per the weather.
 • Give early warnings for flood to minimize the damage due to flood.
 • Controlling the water irrigation in field, which will be controlled automatically by system to reduce the effort of farmers.
 • Controlling the dam gate for distributing water to the fields.

Users:
 • Mainly farmers are the target users of our system.
 • Besides farmers people can use the system to know the weather and get the early flood warnings to get prepared for the upcoming natural events Real-Life Implementation.
 • Dam Gate will be controlled by a motor using the data provided by the water level sensor.
 • Weather module including rain gauge, wind speed sensor, wind direction sensor etc. will be installed in different locations of the field.
 • Node MCU will be connected with each module to send data to the central hub.
 • Central Hub (Arduino Uno) will be installed in the secure location of the field.
 • Central Hub will send the data to the database.
 • Automatic Gate will be installed in the irrigation channel of the field which will be controlled by a motor.
 • Central Hub will send decision based on the data provided by the sensors and control the gate as per requirement.
 • User will control the whole system using a android application.
